description:
The file contain the National Provider Identifier (NPI) and legal name (last name, first name) of  those physicians and non-physician practitioners that are eligible to order and refer PMD and have a current enrollment record in Medicare.
 http://www.cms.gov/Outreach-and-Education/Medicare-Learning-Network-MLN/MLNMattersArticles/Downloads/MM8239.pdf

name: Order and Referring PMD
